pull.title: [Trivial,Doc] Add missing "blocktime" description to listtransactions help, fix formatting.
pull.body: blocktime field described, two small formatting fixes (spaces moved).

events.message: Add missing "blocktime" description to listtransactions help, fix formatting.

events.body: utACK but still, we should finally get rid of this hard coded formatting.
Yes. There are more problems I left there - types are not aligned etc.
Yes, but let's do this after Dec 1 to prevent conflicting with features waiting to get in.
I do not plan to do it at all 8)
Let's cut down on the number of space-massaging commits. I understand it's well-meant, but there are plenty of real issues to solve, at some point this is just commit noise.

Oh I missed that this actually adds help for a field. Sorry. ACK.
(see now you accidentally hid your own, useful change, between the noise :-)
